casebody.data:
In re C.D.A.W. No. 110A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 11, 2006. Gary C. Rhodes, Salisbury, for Angela Wright Eagle. James A. Dickens, Assistant Guilford County Attorney, for Guilford County DSS.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of July 2006 by Appellee (Guardian ad Litem) for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Other (Guardian Ad Litem) shall have up to and including the 24th day of August 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of July 2006."
